text: Mo a moagye adie, monni ho kwan sε mobεfa (mmaa akunafoͻ no sε awugyadeε) adi adeε wͻ aberε a εnyε wͻn pε; anaasε mobεma wͻn ho akyere wͻn sε mobεgye deε mode ama wͻn no mu biribi, gyesε wͻ’bu bra bͻne bi a εda adie. Mone wͻn ntena wͻ kwan pa so efrisε, sε mompε wͻn a, ebia deε mompε no mmom mu na Nyankopͻn de nhyira kεseε paa ahyε mu
